## bgVariant

Css helper for component backgrounds.

### Parameters

-   `enableHoverMediaQuery` **[boolean][1]** Toggles hovering coloring if anchor is present. (optional, default `defaultProps['$enable-hover-media-query']`)
-   `selector` **[string][2]** 
-   `bgColor` **[string][2]** 

Returns **[string][2]**
